Package networks

Interface NeuralNetwork

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NeuralNetworkD, NeuralNetworkF
    public interface NeuralNetwork
    This is an interface containing the basic abstract methods needed in order to operate a NeuralNetwork. It supports using either float or double (java primitives) as the basic calculation unit.
    Author:
    OdinhengeT
    See Also:
    NeuralNetworkF, NeuralNetworkD

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      char getBasicCalculationUnit()  
      double[] run​(double[] input)
      The NeuralNetwork is given an input vector (double), and calculates an output vector (double) by passing its values through the NeuralNetwork.
      float[] run​(float[] input)
      The NeuralNetwork is given an input vector (float), and calculates an output vector (float) by passing its values through the NeuralNetwork.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the NeuralNetwork.
      void train​(double[][] input, double[][] target)
      Trains the network with multiple vector inputs (double) and their corresponding target vectors (double).
      void train​(float[][] input, float[][] target)
      Trains the network with multiple vector inputs (float) and their corresponding target vectors (float).

      • getBasicCalculationUnit

      • run

        double[] run​(double[] input)
        The NeuralNetwork is given an input vector (double), and calculates an output vector (double) by passing its values through the NeuralNetwork.
        Parameters:
        input - a double[] of input values to the NeuralNetwork
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if nbr inputs != nbr InputNeurons
        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the NeuralNetwork doesn't accept inputs of type double

      • run

        float[] run​(float[] input)
        The NeuralNetwork is given an input vector (float), and calculates an output vector (float) by passing its values through the NeuralNetwork.
        Parameters:
        input - a float[] of input values to the NeuralNetwork
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if nbr inputs != nbr InputNeurons
        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the NeuralNetwork doesn't accept inputs of type float

      • train

        void train​(double[][] input,
           double[][] target)
        Trains the network with multiple vector inputs (double) and their corresponding target vectors (double).
        Parameters:
        input - , multiple vector inputs (double) gathered in an array
        target - , multiple vector targets (double) corresponding to the input vectors in input
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if input and target are of different length
        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the NeuralNetwork doesn't accept inputs of type double

      • train

        target - , multiple vector targets (float) corresponding to the input vectors in input
        Throws:

        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - if the NeuralNetwork doesn't accept inputs of type float
